argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_frmy | |- rmY : ( ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) X. ZZ ) --> ZZ |
| 2 | 1 | #P_fovcl | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY a ) e. ZZ ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_zred | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY a ) e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ /\ 0 <_ a ) -> A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_elnn0z | |- ( a e. NN0 <-> ( a e. ZZ /\ 0 <_ a ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_biimpri | |- ( ( a e. ZZ /\ 0 <_ a ) -> a e. NN0 ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ /\ 0 <_ a ) -> a e. NN0 ) |
| 8 |  | #P_rmxypos | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. NN0 ) -> ( 0 < ( A rmX a ) /\ 0 <_ ( A rmY a ) ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 7, 8 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ /\ 0 <_ a ) -> ( 0 < ( A rmX a ) /\ 0 <_ ( A rmY a ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ /\ 0 <_ a ) -> 0 <_ ( A rmY a ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_rmyneg | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ b e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY -u b ) = -u ( A rmY b ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = b -> ( A rmY a ) = ( A rmY b ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = -u b -> ( A rmY a ) = ( A rmY -u b ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = B -> ( A rmY a ) = ( A rmY B ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = ( abs ` B ) -> ( A rmY a ) = ( A rmY ( abs ` B ) ) ) |
| 16 | 3, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15 | #P_oddcomabszz | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( abs ` ( A rmY B ) ) = ( A rmY ( abs ` B ) ) ) |
